name: Angry Cube (Asymmetric Adventures)
description:
TopDown Shooter where you play has cube

Note this is my first ever project and will not be good.

Known issues:

1.Boss Projectiles will collide with ground and get destroyed before reaching player.

2.Projectiles get stuck in the air.

3.Music in level 2 is to loud.

4.Enemy ai derps out and don't recognize player.

5.Enemys Kill each other.
